DART
  • Module Overview
  • View page source

Module OverviewÔÉÅ

DART implements a list of commands for the terminal which you can use to interact with the package:

dart --help :

Displays a list of available commands. Useful to check if DART is available.

dart assembler --path assembler_input.yml :

Initiates the assembler module using the specified configuration file which is named assembler_input.yml here. This will run the assembler and save the output to the directory specified in the configuration file.

dart ligandfilters --path ligandfilters_input.yml :

Executes the ligand filters module based on the provided configuration file which is named ligandfilters_input.yml here. This will run the filter and save the output to the directory specified in the configuration file.

dart dbinfo --path ligand_db.jsonlines:

Saves an overview table of the specified ligand database file which is named ligand_db.jsonlines here. The table will be saved as csv file with the same filename, e.g. here ligand_db.csv. If the input file is the word MetaLig, the table will be generated for the entire MetaLig database.
